title: Worlds 2017 Missions and Loot
body:
Hello, 

If I buy the 2017 Worlds Master Pass in week 1, i will get 12 missions right?
Are these missions the missions from the masterpass missions from week 1-2-3-4-5-6?
So at the and of the 6 weeks I get 560? Or is it something else?

Thanks!

replies.body: After buying the pass you should be getting 2 missions each week. I'm not quite 100% on the grand total amount of tokens you would end up having after doing the pass missions, but 560 does sound about right!

My apologies, but it has been over a week since I purchased the Worlds Missions VIP ticket, and I am still stuck with a missions that says 

"Complete 6 more Worlds Missions"

However, new missions have yet to spawn, and I can not find a time frame anywhere online clarifying "when" the new missions will be coming out?

The only detail I can find is "missions will be weekly".

Okay. I Purchased on the 21st.

It's now the 29th.

Where are this week's missions?

Same here.
Idk maybe the Pregroup doesn't count as week one...
